alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 17 at 1:40AM EST until January 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Coffee, Jeff Davis, Bacon, Appling, Wayne, Atkinson, Pierce, Brantley and Northern Ware Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
